channel.title: How to start a minigame
channel.description: @OF-Alright if you are going to flame me then just leave. Ok hey guys. I'm currently adding a ZombieMinigame to PI. I just need help with the portal to start the minigame. Like when i tele to the minigame i want it to start. But I don't know how to do this. Someone please help.

item.description:

Did you make it like Jad waves? I think its something like:
case ####:
c.yourMinigameThingHere();
c.sendMessage(“You enter the minigame!”);
break;
